com.dermalog.hardware.cardreader

Interface CardReader


  • public interface CardReader

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean close()
      Closes the device.
      byte[] getATR()
      Get the Answer to reset
      boolean isCardPresent()
      Check if card is inserted.
      boolean open()
      Opens the CardReader interface.
      boolean powerOff()
      Power down inserted card
      boolean powerOn()
      Power up inserted card
      byte[] transceive(byte[] apdu)
      Send raw byte APDU to card and return raw response APDU
      ResponseApdu transceive(CommandApdu apdu)
      Send APDU to card and return response APDU

    • Method Detail

      • open

        boolean open()
      throws CardReaderException
        Opens the CardReader interface. This has to be called before any other methods in this interface.
        Returns:
        true if device was successfully opened
        Throws:
        CardReaderException

      • close

        boolean close()
        Closes the device. Call this method after you are done interacting with the device.
        Returns:
        true if device was successfully closed

      • isCardPresent

        boolean isCardPresent()
        Check if card is inserted.

        Note: Some readers do not support card detection for SAM slots. In these cases the return value is always true.

        Returns:
        true if card is inserted

      • powerOn

        boolean powerOn()
         throws CardReaderException
        Power up inserted card
        Returns:
        true if power up was successful
        Throws:
        CardReaderException

      • powerOff

        boolean powerOff()
          throws CardReaderException
        Power down inserted card
        Returns:
        true if power down was successful
        Throws:
        CardReaderException

      • getATR

        byte[] getATR()
        Get the Answer to reset
        Returns:
        ATR

      • transceive

        byte[] transceive(byte[] apdu)
           throws CardReaderException
        Send raw byte APDU to card and return raw response APDU
        Parameters:
        apdu - raw APDU to send
        Returns:
        raw response APDU
        Throws:
        CardReaderException

      • transceive

        ResponseApdu transceive(CommandApdu apdu)
                 throws CardReaderException
        Send APDU to card and return response APDU
        Parameters:
        apdu - Command APDU
        Returns:
        Response APDU
        Throws:
        CardReaderException
